00040 program main
00041 
00042   use execute,  only: run_problem, print_tallies
00043   use global
00044   use geometry, only: read_geometry
00045   use material, only: read_material
00046 
00047   implicit none
00048 
00049   ! read input from user
00050   write(*,*) 'How many particles would you like to simulate?'
00051   read(*,*) nhist
00052   call read_geometry(geo) 
00053   call read_material(mat)
00054 
00055   ! allocate the problem
00056   call allocate_problem()
00057 
00058   ! run problem
00059   call run_problem()
00060 
00061   ! print results to user
00062   call print_tallies()
00063 
00064   ! free memory
00065   call free_memory()
00066 
00067   ! terminate the program
00068   stop
00069 
00070 end program main
